GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.10.154
GSD.description:
btrfs: fix inode list leak during backref walking at find_parent_nodes()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.154 by commit 61e06128113711df0534c404fb6bb528eb7d2332, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit 86d5f994425252d8a40e2184c94a2682ae8ecfbf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: btrfs: fix inode list leak during backref walking at find_parent_nodes()
